title: Peraton Trojan Detection Container.
technique_description: Train a classifier on the most important parameters in the network according to random forest.

train_num_perturbations.description: Number of random noise perturbations to apply. Each will have a gradient calculated, which is averaged into a feature vector.

infer_num_perturbations.description: Number of random noise perturbations to apply. Each will have a gradient calculated, which is averaged into a feature vector.
